# Karmic Backlash (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Hexblade Spells|Hexblade 2]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** 20 ft.

**Area:** 20-ft.-radius emanation, centered on you

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC), pg. 109

*Your magic influences the flow of fate, doing harm to all who would dare attack you.*

This spell functions like *[[Karmic Aura (Spell)|karmic aura]]**,* except that any creature that damages you and fails its Will save becomes [[Exhausted|exhausted]] for 2 rounds.
